name: NSAccessibilityCustomAction
desc: A custom action to perform on an accessible object.

items.name: init(name: String, handler: (() -> Bool)?)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name and handler.

items.name: init(name: String, target: NSObjectProtocol, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name, target, and selector.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A localized name that describes the action.

items.name: var handler: (() -> Bool)?
items.desc: The closure that handles the execution of the action.

items.name: var target: NSObjectProtocol?
items.desc: The object that performs the action through a selector.

items.name: var selector: Selector?
items.desc: The method to call on the target to perform the action.
